intro:
Use Extreme Jump to get to the goal as fast as possible!
You can't afford to be off your guard for even a second in this high-speed jumping action!
description:
■Story
By chance, she saw information about limited edition sweets on a social networking site.
Giriko, a girl who loves sweets,

but this is a remote island, and it's the middle of nowhere!
Can she make it there before closing time with her dashing and jumping...
The battle to the very last minute has just begun.

■Game Overview
A side-scrolling jump action game with simple controls.
Your rank is determined by the time it takes you to clear each stage.
Aim for the highest rank of [S] in all stages.

You can run faster by obtaining speed-up items, but
in exchange the difficulty level will also increase.
Let's challenge the limits of speed while steadily progressing!
Can you keep up with this speed?

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
